GSD.product_version: versions from v5.2 to before v6.1.13
GSD.description:
sched/psi: Fix use-after-free in ep_remove_wait_queue()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.1.13 by commit c6879a4dcefe92d870ab68cabaa9caeda4f2af5a, it was introduced in version v5.2 by commit 0e94682b73bfa6c44c98af7a26771c9c08c055d5. For more details please see the references link.
